org.ldaptive.provider.opendj
Class OpenDJUtils

java.lang.Object
  org.ldaptive.provider.opendj.OpenDJUtils

public class OpenDJUtils
extends Object

Provides methods for converting between OpenDJ specific objects and ldaptive specific objects.

Version:
